sponsors.name: Linode
sponsors.description: Linode provides hosting for Pylons Project websites, including this website and TryPyramid.com.

sponsors.name: JetBrains
sponsors.description: Core developers in any project under the Pylons Project are eligible to receive a renewable one-year free and open source software license for all JetBrains products, including PyCharm, at no cost. Contact user stevepiercy in the #pyramid IRC channel on irc.freenode.net.
